description: Indices of the concatenation of the first n odd numbers (A019519) which are primes.
comments: No others with n <= 12000. _Eric W. Weisstein_, Mar 01, 2004
references: H. Ibstedt, A Few Smarandache Integer Sequences, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 8, No. 1-2-3, 1997, pp. 171-183.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Consecutive Number Sequences

author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
